channel.title: Sean Coleman's Blog
channel.description: This is the blog of Sean Coleman, a developer based on Hong Kong with a background in mathematics and improvised comedy.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: This is a blog post about TDD. If you can read this, I’ve done the minimum necessary work to put a blog post on the internet. I’ll…
item.content:encoded:
This is a blog post about TDD.

If you can read this, I’ve done the minimum necessary work to put a blog post on the internet.

I’ll elaborate later.
